dct_title_s: Orbis terrarum nova et accuratissima tabula
dct_description_sm: Two hemispheres surrounded by mythological figures, with polus articus at top center and polus antarcticus at bottom center. Relief shown pictorially and by shading. First appeared in Jan Jansson's 1658 ''Novus Atlas''. Decorations by N. P. Berchem. "J. de Visscher sculpsit".
